function.name: leagueoveralltopplayers_for_cricketapi2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "cricketapi2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get the overall top players for a specific cricket league in a given season, including player statistics and other relevant information."

tournamentid.description: The ID of the cricket tournament for which you want to retrieve the overall top players.

seasonid.description: The ID of the cricket season for which you want to retrieve the overall top players.

function.name: leaguetotalteamevents_for_cricketapi2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "cricketapi2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get the total team events for a specific Cricket league for a given season by providing its unique tournament ID and season ID."

tournamentid.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league's total team events.

seasonid.description: The season ID for which you want to retrieve the league's total team events.

function.name: prematchform_for_cricketapi2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "cricketapi2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get pre-match form information for a specific cricket match."

is_id.description: The ID of the cricket match for which you want to get pre-match form information.

function.name: get_player_placeholder_for_cricketapi2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "cricketapi2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get the player placeholder image in PNG format."

function.name: categories_for_cricketapi2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "cricketapi2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get a list of all cricket categories."

function.name: leaguenextmatches_for_cricketapi2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "cricketapi2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get a list of next matches for a cricket league using the tournament ID, season ID, and page number."

seasonid.description: The season ID for which you want to retrieve the league's next matches.

tournamentid.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league's next matches.

function.name: teamlastmatches_for_cricketapi2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "cricketapi2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get the last matches for a cricket team by specifying the team ID and the page number (starting from 0)."

page.description: The page number (starting from 0) of the last matches you want to retrieve.

is_id.description: The ID of the cricket team for which you want to retrieve the last matches.

function.name: matchdetails_for_cricketapi2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "cricketapi2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get detailed information for a specific cricket match by providing the match ID."

is_id.description: The ID of the cricket match for which you want to get the details.

function.name: managerplaceholderimage_for_cricketapi2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "cricketapi2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get the manager placeholder image in PNG format."

function.name: matchschedules_for_cricketapi2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "cricketapi2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This operation returns the cricket match schedules for the given date, including match timings, teams, and other relevant information."

year.description: The year for which you want to retrieve the cricket match schedules (e.g., 2022).

day.description: The day of the month for which you want to retrieve the cricket match schedules (1-31).

month.description: The month for which you want to retrieve the cricket match schedules (1-12).

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.cricketapi2: Cricket live score service at CricketApi allows you to follow real time cricket results, standings and fixtures. Live matches from cricket leagues has ball by ball coverage for every inning and detailed tables for fall of the wicket and partnership.For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
